original_text: And Johanan begat Azariah, (he it is that executed the priest's office in the temple that Solomon built in Jerusalem:)
korean_text: 요하난은 아사랴를 낳았으니 이 아사랴는 솔로몬이 예루살렘에 세운 성전에서 제사장의 직분을 행한 자이며

sentences.original_text: he it is that executed the priest's office
in the temple that Solomon built
